articles.description: MacLeod, 33, played in 88 ODIs and 64 T20Is, last turning out for Scotland in the first round of the 2022 T20 World Cup
articles.content: NewsMacLeod, 33, played in 88 ODIs and 64 T20Is, last turning out for Scotland in the first round of the 2022 T20 World Cup

articles.author: Mati
articles.title: Most Wickets in T20 World Cup 2022 - Dispatch news Desk
articles.description: Sri Lanka’s Wanindu Hasaranga has taken most wickets in T20 World Cup 2022 as he has bagged 15 wickets with an average of 13.26.
articles.content:
The ICC Mens T20 World Cup 2022 is reaching to its climax as a few last Super 12 matches are now underway, leading towards the semi-final.

articles.author: Firdose Moonda
articles.title: Petersen hurts hamstring during CSA T20 Challenge final, could be doubtful for Australia tour - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: He was stretchered off the field after hurting himself in the field
articles.content: Keegan Petersen had a poor tour of England, scoring only 122 runs in five innings  •  AFP/Getty Images
